title: Mussels in white wine and cream sauce

ingredients.content: 1000 g mussels, shells scrubbed and de-bearded

preparations.content: Place parsley in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place onions, garlic cloves and extra virgin olive oil in mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>, then sauté <b>8 min/120°C/speed <b>. Meanwhile, scrub and de-beard mussels if necessary and place them in Varoma dish.
Add white wine to mixing bowl, set Varoma in position and steam <b>13 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Set covered Varoma aside on a plate, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup on mixing bowl lid and reduce sauce <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Meanwhile, check the cooked mussels and discard any that haven’t opened.

Add salt, pepper and single cream to mixing bowl and heat <b>2 min/90°C/speed 1<b>. Transfer steamed mussels in their shells to a serving bowl, pour sauce over mussels, sprinkle with reserved chopped parsley and serve immediately.
